name: Marincess Bubble Ring
text: When a monster declares an attack: Negate the attack, and if you do, Special Summon 1 "Marincess Crystal Heart" from your Extra Deck or GY. You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 Link-2 or higher "Marincess" monster you control; it can attack a number of times each Battle Phase this turn, up to its Link Rating, also your opponent takes no battle damage from attacks involving it this turn. You can only activate 1 "Marincess Bubble Ring" per turn.
